title: Poison Center Network Enhancement Act of 2018
content: Poison Center Network Enhancement Act of 2018 This bill amends the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize for FY2020-FY2024 and revise the national toll-free phone number, public awareness campaign, and grant program relating to poison control centers. Among other changes, the bill: supports enhancements of the national toll-free phone number, such as texting capabilities and improved location accuracy. Expands the public awareness campaign to include education about information that is available from poison control centers regarding drug misuse. And authorizes poison control centers and professional organizations to use grant funds for preventing and treating the misuse of opioids and other drugs.
